Package com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect

Interface Summary
CloningDecisionStrategy A strategy interface for customising which parts of an object graph ReflectionCloningStrategy should actually clone.
CyclicReferenceSafeTraverser.Traversal The callback interface for implementing a traversal over an object graph.
InstantiationStrategy A strategy interface for customising how normal objects (as opposed to arrays) are instantiated by ReflectionCloningStrategy.
 

Class Summary
CyclicReferenceSafeTraverser A utility for traversing through entire object graphs which may contain cyclic references, without thereby entering an endless loop.
FieldDescription Describes a field by its name, declaring class name and whether or not it is it of primitive type.
FieldReflector A reflective wrapper around any object, exposing its fields.
MaximalCloningDecisionStrategy When injected into a ReflectionCloningStrategy, decides that all given objects and those that they reference should be cloned.
MinimalCloningDecisionStrategy When injected into a ReflectionCloningStrategy, decides that only those objects whose Classes would be different if loaded through the other ClassLoader should be cloned.
ObjenesisInstantiationStrategy Uses ObjenesisStd to create new instances of Classes without invoking their constructors.
ReflectionCloningStrategy A CloningStrategy that uses Java Reflection as its mechanism.
